i) The min/max length.
ii) The defined password complexity.
iii) The password change frequency (e.g. every 90 days).
iv) Account lock-out threshold (e.g. six failed attempts).
v) Account lock-out duration (e.g. 30 minutes or until an administrator enables the user id).
vi) The number of generations during which a password cannot be re-used.
vii) That an immediate change to a permanent password is required when a temporary password is
